title: Twisted Rose
description: Warning! This book contains triggers that some readers will find distressing. It is not for the faint of heart.This is the third book of The Darkness Trilogy. The first book is Tangled Rose.Rose Meadows was taken. She was tortured. She was abused. She was humiliated.And then she was rescued. Josh Carter came like a wolf in the night and stole her away from the Dark Rebel Motorcycle Club. He took her to a safe place and already they can feel the stirrings of love grow between them.But Josh left the job unfinished. The men who hurt Rose are still free. They are still hurting other girls. When Josh sees how traumatized and damaged Rose is because of what they did to her, he knows he has no choice. He must risk everything, even the chance of a happy life with Rose, in order to bring justice to the men who hurt her.This is the stunning finale to the best-selling trilogy that has been making waves for its gritty realism, graphic depictions of humiliation, and for showing the courage of one woman who refuses to let darkness overcome her. Drawn from real events in the life of the author it shows that women are stronger than their abusers and capable of more courage than anyone ever gave them credit for.Read this book. Celebrate its honesty. Remember the journey.
author: Abby Weeks
